categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Banking Clan shuttle was a small transport utilized by the InterGalactic Banking Clan.
The shuttle appeared as a scaled-down design of the Munificent-class star frigate in appearance, with horizontal wings and a stubby tailfin.
A pair of Clan representatives used a shuttle of this kind to visit the Quingarus Deluxe Droid Systems Factory during the Clone Wars.
